channel.title: Client not connecting
channel.description: I'm sure this is a simple fix but I'm still learning as I go. I've got the source connected, when I open the client it doesn't load I changed the loader.java to my localhost/127.0.0.1 and changed and opened the 43594 port. Am I missing something to get the Source and the Client to communicate with each other? Thanks a lot!

item.title: Client not connecting
item.dc:creator: @Andy1993 Andy1993
item.description:
@Andy1993 wrote:

Hi… It’s generaly in Client.java (client side)
Then search for “Server =” and put the IP’s there

Read full topic
